title: 1997 Halifax Blue Sox season
text: The 1997 Halifax Blue Sox season was the 102nd season in the club's <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> history and the second season in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>. Coached by <a href="John%20Pendlebury%20%28rugby%20league%29">John Pendlebury</a>, the Halifax Blue Sox competed in <a href="Super%20League%20II">Super League II</a> and finished in 7th place. The club also reached the fifth round of the <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a>.
